posts.name: Elaine
posts.cooked:
Today, we’re releasing version 7.73 to beta. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta group.

Release notes:

  • If you’re in the middle of writing a message, now that thread will appear at the top of your chat list so it’s even easier to craft the perfect draft.

Let us know about any issues you experience! Thank you for being a beta tester!

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.72 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.73.0.949-beta

66 new commits since 7.72.0.943-beta (+ 1 commit omitted):

Show commits

  • Bump version to 7.73 [1]

  • Always set BackupId, not just if Backups are enabled [2]

  • End Backups Onboarding in AppSettings(BackupSettings) [3]

  • Perform a regular "keep alive" of backups [4]

  • Clean up methods for managing AEP state [5]

  • Don't stop the backup upload queue when missing an attachment file [6]

  • Add beta labeling to backups [7]

  • Improve cancellation/error handling around some QuickRestore operations [8]

  • Modernize OWSDevice [9]

  • Store plaintext names for OWSDevice, decrypt/encrypt in OWSDeviceService [10]

  • Adjust warning string for "clear chat history" [11]

  • Add UX for rotating the AEP, from Backup Settings [12]

  • Signal iOS app crashes as soon as adding a mention before an already existing mention. [13]

  • Fix some edge cases with adding mentions before other mentions [14]

  • Don't repeatedly call didDrainQueue when the TaskQueue was not drained [15]

  • Safety check that uploads aren't deleting the primary attachment file [16]

  • Consolidate OWSDevice-related types and files [17]

  • Add logging to OWSSyncManager for contact syncs [18]

  • Show two layers of confirmation before clearing all chat history [19]

  • Parse createdAtCiphertext in fetched device list, instead of plaintext createdAt [20]

  • Use registrationId instead of createdAt during device linking [21]

  • Add internal toggle to disable transit tier upload reuse [22]

  • Always show sidebar on iPadOS 26 [23]

  • Significantly slim OWSHTTPError [24]

  • Persist the transit tier info used for media tier upload [25]

  • Pass Thread to debug submenus [26]

  • Retry with exponential backoff when Backup uploads are rate-limited [27]

  • Call more efficient method after connecting proxy [28]

  • Clean up some auth/unauth socket distinctions [29]

  • Adjust /devicecheck TSRequests [30]

  • Simplify connection state concurrency guarantees [31]

  • Fix byte count logging for attachment uploads with no passed-in progress [32]

  • Fix for BackupSettings deviceSleepBlock not resuming after cancel [33]

  • Update table max width calculation [34]

  • Restore conversation nav bar subtitle color [35]

  • Update libsignal to 0.78.2 [36]

  • Deleting mentions before existing mentions shifts mention range incorrectly [37]

  • Use separate task queues for backup media tier fullsize vs thumbnail uploads [38]

  • Update table max width calculation again lol [39]

  • Fix info icon coloring in dark mode [40]

  • Use dynamic timeout when sending messages [41]

  • Make owsFail more descriptive [42]

  • SVR​ error handling [43]

  • Add SVR​ fields to RegistrationProvisioningMessage proto [44]

  • Wait 3s before clearing the "last app launch crashed" counter [45]

  • Backup attachment download speed quick wins [46]

  • Add log line with mode to BackupExportJob [47]

  • Remove ios.shouldVerifyPniAndPniIdentityKeyExist [48]

  • Wrap BGProcessingTask(BackupExportJob) in runWithChatConnection [49]

  • Delete broken EditRecords when deleting messages [50]

  • Add SDK check with iOS 26 checks [51]

  • Always use the web socket to test the proxy [52]

  • Use uploadEra always to decide whether to run List Media [53]

  • Info image already exists as a symbol [54]

  • Remove the (unused) ability to derive a BackupKey from the MasterKey [55]

  • Remove deprecated ssre and deleteSync capabilities [56]

  • Rotate MRBK when rotating the AEP [57]

  • Avoid wiping debug logs for devices during first launch [58]

  • Wipe SVR​ nonce metadata locally when rotating the AEP [59]

  • Remove getOrGenerateAccountEntropyPool from AccountKeyStore [60]

  • Don't prefer media tier downloads if backups disabled [61]

  • TaskQueueRunner cancellation semantics update [62]

  • Add cheaper check if upload queue is already running [63]

  • Stop reading incrementalMac from backup proto [64]

  • Update release notes [65]

  • Update translations [66]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-iOS 7.72.0.943-beta…7.73.0.949-beta

posts.name: Golden Dragonfly
posts.cooked:
This bug was headache for long time in android.
Now this same happening in ios. Please fix ASAP.

Disable Signal's auto rotation implementation in video calls Feature Requests
On Feb. 2, 2021, the signal added video rotation (landscape mode) on video call. It checks the device orientation angels every time you’re on a video call. If the phone “A” is turned 90º clockwise (LANDSCAPE RIGHT EDGE) and the phone “B” is in portrait mode, the signal turns the video for the phone “B” clockwise 270° . The video turns clockwise 90° on the phone “B” if the phone “A” is rotated 270° (LANDSCAPE LEFT EDGE). So that your face is always appears up on the other end. It works well …

link_counts.title: Disable Signal's auto rotation implementation in video calls

Beta testing for this release has concluded. If you find any further bugs related to this release or earlier releases, please report them on GitHub (read How to Report Bugs for more information on how to do that).

If you have feedback specifically related to the new beta version, please post it in the following topic: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.74 release.
